ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] hunting ideas (was Najena)
ygData.msgSnippet: Invisible?  I hunted there around 25-28 on and off.  Redwind is the named Orc at the icy orc temple.  He is/was used as part of a ranger quest, so there were
ygData.messageBody:
Invisible? I hunted there around 25-28 on and off. Redwind is the named
Orc at the icy orc temple. He is/was used as part of a ranger quest, so
there were always lots of rangers to hunt with at the time.

Be very careful, he has HT, as I found out :) However, a group with a bard
can easily split/hold the temple with Lamenet.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Bill Costlow [SMTP:atlatyl@...]
> Sent: Friday, March 31, 2000 1:09 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] hunting ideas (was Najena)
>
> Try Permafrost or icy orcs at the temple in Everfrost.
>
> Not many folks there and there's an invisible NPC in
> the icy orc temple...found him playing my druid (using
> Tracking skill). Icy Orcs con red to a 20th lvl druid
> so not sure what he's doing there (name is something
> Redwind....)
>
> Anybody know about this?
>
>
>
> --- Pinen <ubersorcerer@...> wrote:
> > As a casual player I'm having a hard time getting
> > out of 23rd level is this
> > the place for me I'm currently in Sol A but keep
> > dieing...I can solo in SK
> > and Lake rathe with little or no problem but exp is
> > sloooooooooooow and
> > finding an open spot in LR is hard.
> > Pinen
> > 23 bard
> >
> >
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Adam Wasserman [mailto:wassermana@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, March 30, 2000 4:35 PM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: RE: [eqbards] Attack speedups
> >
> > <SNIP>
> >
> >
> >
> > Furthermore, using an all instrument attack (Hymn,
> > DDD, CoD) you can plow
> > through tentacle terrors. I soloed all of level 24
> > in one night (4-5
> > hours)
> > just killing the TTs in najena. Najena is a great
> > spot for many of the
> > same
> > reasons as sol a. It is empty. (the night I
> > soloed, I was the only person
> > in
> > najena)
> >
> >
> > [Non-text portions of this message have been
> > removed]
> >
> >
